00038   const REPLACE_VALUE = '%VALUE%';
00039   
00055   private static $available_options = array(
00056     // Title of the PDF
00057     'title'                     => array(
00058       '',
00059       'is_string',
00060       null,
00061       null,
00062       null,
00063     ),
00064     
00065     // Print PDF with gray color
00066     'grayscale'                 => array(
00067       false,
00068       'is_numeric',
00069       null,
00070       '--grayscale',
00071       '',
00072     ),
00073     
00074     // Define the number of copies
00075     'copies'                    => array(
00076       1,
00077       'is_numeric',
00078       null,
00079       null,
00080       null,
00081     ),
00082     
00083     // Define orientation page
00084     'orientation'               => array(
00085       'Portrait',
00086       'preg_match',
00087       array('/^(Portrait|Landscape)$/', ApiPrintOption::REPLACE_VALUE),
00088       null,
00089       null,
00090     ),
00091     
00092     // Define pagesize
00093     'page-size'                 => array(
00094       'A4',
00095       'is_string',
00096       null,
00097       null,
00098       null,
00099     ),
00100     
00101     // Define the margin bottom

00204   public static function getOptions($options)
00205   {
00206     $options_cmdline = '';
00207     
00208     foreach ($options as $option => $value) {
00209       $options_cmdline .= ApiPrintOption::parseOption($option, $value);
00210     }
00211     
00212     return $options_cmdline;
00213   }
00214   
00215   
00216   
00228   private static function parseOption($option, $value)
00229   {
00230     // if option name is unknowned, throw exception
00231     if (isset(ApiPrintOption::$available_options[$option]) === false) {
00232       throw new Exception('unknown option : '.$option);
00233     } 
00234     
00235     $default_value    = ApiPrintOption::$available_options[$option][0];
00236     $check_function   = ApiPrintOption::$available_options[$option][1];
00237     $check_parameters = ApiPrintOption::$available_options[$option][2];
00238     $enable_value     = ApiPrintOption::$available_options[$option][3];
00239     $disable_value    = ApiPrintOption::$available_options[$option][4];
00240     
00241     // replace the value in the parameter array
00242     if (is_array($check_parameters) === true) {
00243       $key = array_search(ApiPrintOption::REPLACE_VALUE, $check_parameters);
00244       if ($key !== false) {
00245         $check_parameters[$key] = $value;
00246       }
00247     } else {
00248       $check_parameters = array($value);
00249     }
00250     
00251     // check if the check function is callable
00252     if (is_callable($check_function, false) === false) {
00253       throw new Exception('The check function isn\'t callable');
00254     }
00255     
00256     // execute validator
00257     if ((bool)call_user_func_array($check_function, $check_parameters) === false) {
00258       throw new Exception('The option '.$option.' doesn\'t pass the test');
00259     }
00260     
00261     // Check value and build command line
00262     if (is_bool($default_value) === true) {
00263       if ((bool)$value === true) {
00264         $option_cmdline = ' '.$enable_value;
00265       } else {
00266         $option_cmdline = ' '.$disable_value;
00267       }
00268     } else {
00269       $option_cmdline = ' --'.$option.' '.escapeshellarg($value);
00270     }
00271     
00272     return $option_cmdline;
00273   }
00274 }
